topics.body:
"@Bryon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/544741aa63687210a03b0100#post_544741aa63687210a03b0100


ah yes, the first words i said once i listened to DG for the first time.

i will never forget that charles mason narrative or how i held down to my chair as mc ride started screaming about summoning the antichrist and abandons his humanity, giving in to the anger and frustration in his mind and becoming a sort of monster among men.

sacrifice, satanism, violence, intolerance, greed, rage, witchcraft and magick, and suicide, all in 1 song (something no other artist has done so well IMO)

im about to cry, nostalgia is too much for me.
